citations.narrative:
There is a section of a square metal tubing of a divider door within the enclosure housing 5 capuchins on the monkey
island that is rusted to the point that a 3-4 inch section of it is missing resulting in sharp, jagged edges. Also the metal
sliding door of an enclosure housing two capuchins is rusted resulting is jagged edges.
Sharp jagged metal edges in contact with non-human primates can cause injuries. All surfaces must be maintained to be
free of jagged edges.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 29 November 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.75(c)(1)(ii) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is a section of a square metal tubing of a divider door within the enclosure housing 5 capuchins on the monkey 
island that is rusted to the point that a 3-4 inch section of it is missing resulting in sharp, jagged edges. Also the metal 
sliding door of an enclosure housing two capuchins is rusted resulting is jagged edges. 
Sharp jagged metal edges in contact with non-human primates can cause injuries. All surfaces must be maintained to be 
free of jagged edges. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspections or by 29 November 2025 or the applicant will forfeit the license 
fee and must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
